package.name: capnav_real
package.description:
CapNav-Real: Attribute-Aware Navigation for Real Wheelchair (Improved from ICLR 2026)
Based on: Vatsi et al., "CapNav: Towards Robust Indoor Navigation with Description-First Maps"
Improvements over original CapNav: - Real robot deployment (not simulation) - Adaptive threshold calibration - Uncertainty estimation per attribute - Dynamic map updates - ROS2 Jazzy + Nav2 integration - Wheelchair-specific safety constraints
package.author: Siddharth Tiwari (Real Robot Adaptation)
Ritali Vatsi (Original CapNav)
